*Munch* *Chew* *Munch*

"Misty...?"

The redhead looked up from her lunch, a sandwich and some chips she had been saving from their last stop at the town just down the road. Some crumbs were hanging around her mouth and had even fallen on her shirt. She looked up at Ash as he squatted down in front of her, holding his cap in his left hand for some reason.

"You uh...eating alright?" He asked nervously. Misty set her sandwich down atop her bag of chips, then shot Ash an annoyed glare.

"...Just what do you mean by that?"

"N-nothing...just, ah, just wondering is all..." Ash said defensively, smiling nervously before putting his cap back on, standing upright and walking back to where he put his own lunch with a brisk pace.

Misty sighed as she looked over at her sandwich. She looked down at her stomach, a plump, soft muffin top flowing over her shorts, which were a bit tighter around her sizable rear, wider hips and plump legs. She shrugged and went back to her sandwich, cramming another mouthful of mayo, lettuce, bread, tomato and roasted ham.

They didn't take long to set off on the road again. The path was a level grassy plain with a definite dirt path and some rocks and ledges here and there. It was a very peaceful, picturesque scene. The only thing that really bothered Misty about it was the occasional Rattata nipping at her heels. Misty looked up at the sky and enjoyed the peaceful sunny sky...why was that cloud moving so fast?

"Crap..." Brock said as she stared upwards. "I guess we'll be seeing rain soon. If the clouds are drifting that fast, that means rain and fog in no time."

"What?! Wait, can't we set up a camp or something?" Misty queried. Any camping trip or Pokemon journey could have the joy snuffed out of it in a flash by the whims of mother nature it seemed.

"Ahh, don't worry." Brock said in his usual affable tone as he waved a hand, pulling his map out of his backpack. "It says here there's a Pokemon Center just up the road. If we hurry, we can be there before the rain starts falling too hard."

Ash nodded as she and Pikachu started to pelt off ahead, with Brock following behind. Misty found it a tad harder then usual to keep up, but she was still holding her own.

A little belly fat isn't gonna weight me down! She thought as she kept sprinting, admittedly keeping an impressive pace in and of itself.

weight to about 150. One day, they were continuing through some woods.

"Ash, when are we gonna be there?" Misty yelled, "I'm starving!"

"Just hold on, we'll be there soon. Then we can all get something to eat," Ash answered.

Soon they found their way to Celedon City. After taking their Pokemon to the nearest Pokemon Center, they
went out immediately to find the nearest all-you-can-eat buffet. When they got there, Misty discovered she was
totally broke.

"Ash?" Misty asked.

She was staring into his face with those cute, huge eyes.

"Can you buy me dinner? I'm broke."

Ash knew he couldn't say no to those eyes and immediately gave in.

"Ok."

"Thanks, Ash!" Misty answered happily.

She gave him a big hug and drug him up to the counter to pay. Within a few more seconds they were at the mega bar
piling food up on their plates.

When they were seated at the table, Ash was careful not to move too much because he didn't want to get caught up in
the frenzy that was... Misty eating. Within no time at all both had cleared their plates. After they were done,
they left to pick up their Pokemon from the Pokemon Center. All the while, Ash was pleased with how he had made
Misty happy. Maybe doing that again would make her more happy, he thought. The stayed the night at the Pokemon Center
and after another meal at the restaurant they continued on. Misty, with a full stomach, was quite happy and as they
walked along she was smiling, which made Ash happy. Ash decided he should treat her to a big lunch.

"Ash, I'm starving!"

"But we just ate an hour ago, Misty."

"Well I want food, now!"

"Alright, hold on."

Ash sat down on a large tree stump as did Pikachu and he went through his backpack.

"Waa! There's no more food!" Ash shouted, frantically seaching for something to eat, "You must have eaten the rest
of it when we had lunch! Again..."

"What?! Ash Ketchum, are you saying that I'm fat and gluttonous?!"

"Um, well, you see..."

Ash looked at Misty. She had indeed gotten bigger since they started their journey back to Pallet. Her pants looked
tighter and her suspenders were beginning to hold back a small new belly she was growing. Misty looked down at herself.

"I am fat aren't I?" she inquired angrily.

"It's ok, Misty. You still look great, no matter what."

Misty looked up into Ash's eyes.

"Really?"

"Really. Now come on, let's go find another town. Maybe there's a nice restaurant there we can eat at."

Misty smiled and her eyes lit up.

"Ok!"

Ash and Misty had finally reached Saffron City. It was late afternoon and both were very tired from the walking.
Plus, they were starving. Despite Ash telling Misty they'd eat at a restaurant, they decided they'd eat and sleep
at the Pokemon Center because they were so tired. Misty wasn't tired enough to slow down her appetite, though.
They soon were ready for bed after they ate. Pikachu hopped up on the bed and quickly dozed off. At that time, Misty
was also putting Togepi to bed, right by hers. Soon the both of them passed out and woke around 9:00am the next morning.

"Hey, Misty," Ash whispered, patting her on the shoulder to wake her up.

"Wha?... Oh, good morning, Ash."

"Hey, they're having eggs and bacon for breakfast; Let's go!"

"Great."

Both were downstairs in a flash. Ash had a plate of bacon and eggs but Misty had ten eggs and ten strips of
bacon, respectively, washing it down with half a gallon of orange juice. They soon packed their things
and left. Nurse Joy was almost happy to see her go. About half an hour later...

"Ash, I'm starving!"

"Again?" Ash asked, sweatdropping.

Misty's stomach growled.

"Yes, again! Do you have anything to eat?"

"Well, I didn't have time to buy much. I have these though..."

"Ugh... rice balls," Misty said, a bit sickened, "I'm sick of eating those."

"Well if you don't want them then-"

Misty had already finished off one and started in on another.

Ash just sweatdropped.

Barely enough to tide Misty over and shut her up for a while, the two went on. It was nearing lunch time, and
Ash knew this. Before Misty said anything, he stopped.

"Hey, let's have lunch now," he said.

Misty was confused. Was he doing this for her? But she didn't want to argue, she was hungry anyway. A few minutes later...

"Mmm, these sandwiches are great!" she said, with her mouth full, "Did you make these, Ash?"

"Yep, just for you," Ash answered.

Misty blushed and kept munching. After Ash had eaten his sandwich and Misty ate her share (five),
Ash checked the food supply in his backpack.

"Well there goes lunch for the next few days...," Ash said, sweatdropping.

Ash didn't care though. He'd made Misty happy yet again. He looked over at her, where she was sitting on a rock.

'Whoa, she's really gotten bigger in the past couple months,' Ash thought 'It's weird I hadn't really noticed.'

Misty now had two wider, plumper legs, and her belly, although not too big, edged out just a slight few inches
into her lap. Ash was surprised he could even see her bellybutton, which was usually covered. Her tank top was
even a bit tighter. Ash enjoyed looking at her now abundant curves but veered his eyes away when she looked over
in his direction.

"Togepi and I are ready to go," she said.

"Ok, we'll leave in a few minutes," he answered.

After filling up their canteens with water they set off yet again.

They were soon at Cerulean City, but not before stopping at a few more towns... and a few (or more)
all-you-can-eat-buffets. Misty thought she'd pay her sisters and Pokemon a visit. They went right in
because it was also Misty's gym, after all. They walked around until they found three familiar figures (not Team Rocket!).

"Hey, it's Lil Sis!" Daisy exclaimed.

The trio ran up to them.

"Whoa, like, not 'Lil' Sis any more!" Violet commented.

"Like, you sure have gotten big," Lily added finally.

Misty didn't like their teasing, even though this topic was new. Ash could see it in her eyes and squeezed her
hand. Misty smiled. Later they all caught up on recent events and Ash and Misty were able to spend the night
there. They stayed in Misty's old room; Ash sleeping on the floor. Misty looked down at Ash from her bed.

"Ash, thanks for earlier," said Misty, "My sisters can be so mean sometimes."

"I understand. Well, I don't have any brothers or sisters or anything, but they should treat you better. I know,
how about tomorrow we go out for some ice cream, maybe you'll feel better then."

Misty thought for a second. This was the reason this problem came about, but it was ASH that was asking her...
how could she say no? She smiled.

"Sure!"

"Ok, we'll go after lunch tomorrow. Goodnight, Mist."

'Wow, he hardly ever calls me that,' she thought, "Goodnight, Ash."

Misty happily fell asleep, as did Ash (and the Pokemon!).

12513211.content:
One day Makoto was cleaning her attic when she found a book. It was called "Recipes of Bliss" and as she looked through the pages she realized it was a cook book. Though she noticed one page in the front was missing, at the time she thought it nothing of it. Little did she realize, the page missing was a warning. It stated that "These recipes are fattening, slow down metabolism, and can cause people to change in behavior." The reason this book was in her house was because her mother bought the book before her untimely death, but after reading the warning she decided not to use it, but forgot to throw it out. Now it was in the hands of her excellent cook of a daughter.

"Cool! Some new recipes. I'll use it later tonight for dinner." Makoto thought as she took the book to her room. Later that night she did try a recipe for a cake, though she did have to admit that the recipe was strange. It required more sugar than most cakes, lots of butter, and even needed beans, gravy, and lard! "Weird recipe, but I'm might as well try it." thought Makoto as she put the finishing touches on the cake. Soon she took a small bite out of the cake and was shocked by the taste. It was sweet and had a unique flavor that made it irresistible. It wasn't long before she ate the entire cake, even the crumbs.

After all eating the cake Makoto said to herself "That was fantastic, I've got to try another recipe tomorrow! BUUURRRRRRPPPPPP!" normally Makoto would have been embarrassed by such a large burp from her, yet she wasn't. She thought it was because she was alone, but wasn't aware that it was slowly changing her personality. She even went to bed earlier than she usually would, but it was because she was so tired. Soon she fell asleep and began to have a strange dream. In it she was surrounded by food and there was a enormous version of the cake she ate fifteen minutes ago. She began eating all of the food with out a care in the world.

Later...
12513211.title: The Recipe Book

choices: The next day she begins to eat even more unhealthy food
Three days later her friends come to visit and find a messy fat Makoto
125132111.content:
Makoto woke up the next morning, with a mighty yawn. When she began to stir she recalled her dream form last night. Her whole dream was about her eating nothing but fattening goodies. She thought it was only a dream from eating her cake last night and nothing more. Even though she chose to dismiss last night’s dream, she admitted to herself that she never had a dream like that before, it as such a bizarre yet surprisingly delightful dream.

Then Makoto noticed the clock in her room. Even though Makoto had gone to bed early last night, she slept in until noon. Luckily for her it was early summer so she could sleep in if she wanted to. Still Makoto had never slept in like this before in her life. Yet Makoto was surprising nonchalant about sleeping in. Normally she would never allow her self to sleep in so much and waste part of the day in bed. Today was different though, for some reason Makoto did not feel like herself. It was as if a part of her conscience decided to relax and take the day off.

Another thing that was different from her normal was that instead of changing into her pajamas last night, she wore her clothes from last night to bed. At first when Makoto noticed this she thought “I never changed!?! How embarrassing. I’d better change into some clean clothes.” she thought to herself. Then another thought entered her head “Wait, I don’t need to go anywhere today. I could just stay home and make some more of those recipes. So why should I change my clothes? It’s not like I need to dress up and impress someone. I guess one day of wearing the same clothes again isn’t going to hurt.” Then a growl from her stomach ended Makoto’s previous thought and she walked downstairs to get some more food.

Once again she pulled out the “Recipes of Bliss” cook book and looked through the pages to find a new recipe. This time a chocolate cupcake recipe caught her interest and she began to cook. The cupcakes in the book were double the size of average cupcakes and the book recommended making two dozen cupcakes. Like the last recipe, Makoto added all the very unhealthy ingredients like beans, lard, and gravy. After a short half hour the cupcakes were done and Makoto tried them. Like the cake, the cupcakes had a flavor that was a mix between tangy, greasy, and sugary and that was too delicious to resist.

Then while eating the cupcakes she noticed the TV in her den. She then decided that she could enjoy her cupcakes in front of the TV. She hadn’t watched TV in awhile so it might be interesting to see what’s on the news. When she turned the television on, the news came on. As she watched the news, it got less and less interesting. It was all nothing but updates on the economy and small incidents that Makoto could care less about. Eventually she decided to change the channel and watch something else. Then she changed the channel to some silly cartoon. At first she thought watching a dumb cartoon was a waste of time and was about to change the channel, yet as she watched it she began to enjoy it. The humor was funny and simple to follow and the cartoon characters were entertaining in their unique style. She decided that she would eat her cupcakes while watching this show.

As she watched the show she enjoyed eating her cupcakes. The taste of the cupcakes and funny cartoon were creating a surprisingly cozy experience for Makoto as she ate her cupcakes. The TV made it hard for her to think about anything but the cartoon she was watching. Her cupcakes helped her enter a state of rapture while she watched the show. She was so engrossed by the television and her food she didn’t even notice what was coming out of her mouth. As Makoto watched the television, drool had formed around her mouth. The more she watched television the more the flow of drool began to increase. Not only was there drool, but whenever she laughed at something funny on the show, crumbs and pieces of food came out of her mouth. Soon her clothes were covered in food stains and small drops of saliva. She also had not noticed that she had gained at least ten pounds from the cake and cupcakes. Makoto didn’t care though, she was too happy to indulge in her food and TV.

1251321111.content:
The next day, Makoto got up out of bed at around 1 PM, excited to see what other foods she would try in the book. She was going to change her clothes, but after she found out her washing machine was broken, she just shrugged and figured she would take care of it later. She hadn't showered since the other day either since she figured it would be a waste of time in these clothes.

Looking through the book in her sweaty, dirty clothes, she licked her lips at some of the suggestions. Strawberry cake, candy hot dogs, sweet soda... she knew one of these days she'd have to hold a feast for her friends. But for now, she had to try some of these out.

She was interested in the sugar dumplings today. This recipe required a whole bag of sugar, six bottles of syrup, two servings of olive oil and ten cans of beans! She was surprised at how daunting it was, but had to try it anyways. After getting the ingredients, she mixed it all together, cooked the dumplings for thirty minutes, and took them with her to the couch. With fifty dumplings cooked, she had enough to last her a day, or even more! She flicked on the TV, excited for the marathon of a cute cartoon she had been enjoying. It was made for really young girls, but she had been entertained by it.

She took out the first dumpling and took a big bite. She groaned with her mouth full at how good the dumpling tasted. The syrup brought out a sugary flavor and the oily crumbs stook to her mouth. PHHHHHHHHFRT! She blushed when she realized that she farted really loudly, but forgot about it quickly after something funny happened on the cartoon. Finishing the first one, she took another one out and began shoving it into her maw.

"Guess it wouldn't hurt enjoying myself for another day," she thought.
1251321111.title: The next day she begins to eat even more unheal...

choices: ...banana cream pies (the pies change her personality)
...dark chocolate cake (the cake changes her body)
12513211111.content:
The next day Makoto had once again slept in through the morning and woke up around noon. This morning was a little different since she did decided that she would try to eat something healthy after eating nothing but unhealthy snacks for the past few days. So she thought "I can't believe I ate nothing but the food from my recipe book. Those recipes can't be healthy, judging from the ingredients. I should eat something healthy today, like some cereal with milk." Soon Makoto went down the stairs to get a healthy breakfast, even though it's past breakfast time.

When she got to the bottom of the stairs, she went straight towards the kitchen and grabbed a large bowl from the pantry. Soon she grabbed the milk and cereal and filled the bowl and began eating immediately. When she ate her cereal she didn't use a spoon, she actually dipped her hand into the cereal and pulled out the cereal and brought it to her mouth. Because she ate like this, milk leaked through her hands and spilled on to her clothes, making her clothes even worse since she still hadn't washed them in days. She didn't seem to notice though, for some reason it felt as if she always ate food with her hands instead of utensils.

She finished her bowl of cereal in a matter of minutes, yet when she was finished she was still hungry. "Weird. I just ate a large bowl of cereal and I'm still hungry. Maybe I'm just think I'm still hungry." thought Makoto as she went into her den to watch some more TV. Her TV time was interrupted thought when she heard a loud growl come from her stomach. "Huh? I guess I am still hungry. One more bowl of cereal wouldn't hurt." Makoto told herself as she returned to the kitchen. She filled her bowl with cereal and milk again, and just like before she ate with her hands instead of spoons. She finished her second bowl and still wasn't satisfied. She tried again with another bowl of cereal, and again she was still craving more food. She kept trying to give her self a healthy breakfast by giving herself more cereal until the cereal box was empty. "That box must have been almost empty. I'm still hungry." she thought not realizing that the box was new and full when she had her first bowl."How about I try some strawberries instead." Makoto then grabbed a bag of strawberries and ate them quickly. Like the cereal, by the time she finished them she was still hungry. Soon she raided her fridge for anything healthy, hoping to satisfy her hunger, but nothing helped. She tried various fruits and vegetables or anything else healthy, but nothing filled her bottomless pit of a stomach.

"I can believe I'm still hungry, why am I still hungry? Wait, maybe because it's past breakfast time! I must be hungry for lunch too." thought Makoto as she noticed the "Recipes of Bliss" book on her kitchen counter. "Guess I couldn't hurt to try more recipes from that cook book." Little did she realize that the next recipe she picked would change her even further.

After following the recipe exactly, Makoto made some...

125132111112.content:
DING! Makoto licked her lips as the timer made known that her cake was finished. She took it out of the oven as she marveled at the large, chocolate cake.

"Mmmmm.... this looks so good!" she thought. Instead of cutting off a small slice, she cut off a large quarter of the cake and took it out to the couch, without even taking along a plate or utensils. As she watched her favorite cartoon, she took a large bite and chewed on the chocolate cake, as crumbs fell upon her ruined clothing. PHHHFRRRRRT! She let loose a huge fart, but didn't really notice as she giggled at a joke with cake stuffed into her mouth. She at the rest of the cake chunk while watching the show, finishing up with a satisfied burp as she wiped her messy fingers on her clothes.

"Mmmm, I'm still quite hungry" she thought. She got up and walked to the kitchen to get another slice, but felt that it was too tiring to keep walking like that and that she'd rather sit on the couch all day. With a great plan in mind, she took the rest of the cake with her, along with a full 24-pack of coke she had in the fridge. She sat on the crumby couch as she bit into the large cake.

As she ate through the cake for another hour, her belly protuded quite heavily. Now with 50 extra pounds, the flab was starting to stretch out of her shirt. She was also farting much more, but it didn't bother her at all.

She managed to finish the cake, as she gulped down a can of coke in one take, letting some of it dribble down her mouth to her stomach without a second thought. She burped as she tossed the can to her side. Yawning, she started feeling really tired, even after only being awake for a couple hours.

"I could use a nap..." she said as she passed out on her couch.

1251321111122.content:
Makoto enjoyed her nap, but her nap was interrupted by something strange. For some reason, she had a desire to go look at herself in the mirror. She couldn't explain why, it just felt almost like an instinct that took over in an instant. Luckily for her there was a mirror nearby, so naturally she went to go look at herself. After looking in the mirror, she finally noticed how much she had let her self go over the past few days.

The first thing she realized was that she had gained weight after all that eating. The most noticeable feature of her gain was her belly that had rolls of fat that stretched a couple inches past her waist. Her once flat belly had become a large sphere that was big enough to jiggle with every couple of steps she took. Her face had also become more round with chubby cheeks and the beginning of a second chin. She also noticed that her cleavage had dramatically increased as well. Makoto guessed that she was at least over 200 pounds now. It was shocking that her clothes hadn't rip yet from all this gain.

Speaking of her clothes, Makoto noticed the shabby state her clothes were in. There were stains almost everywhere making Makoto look as if she hadn't washed her clothes for a couple of months. Plus even though her clothes haven't ripped yet, it was clear that the clothes were having trouble

Makoto was repulsed by how disgusting she had gotten... for a about a second! A part of her told her that she looked good like this. "Wow! Look at me! My breasts are way bigger than before and I've got a soft belly to give belly massages. I might have to go out and get some new clothes though, I have a feeling that I need something bigger for my new look. First I'll get a snack." Makoto didn't even question how she got so fat and lazy suddenly or why she liked how she looked now.

Later, Makoto finished her latest concoction from the book and sat on the couch and re-continued watching cartoons. Soon Makoto decided...

12513211111221.content:
"You know I look with these extra pounds. I bet the other scouts would look good with theses pounds too." Makoto then began imagining her friends in a similar state to hers. Each one of them with dirty clothes and extra weight. "I bet if they all come over and hang out with me, they'll join me!"

Then she realized that it wouldn't be a good idea to invite all them at once. They'd probably want to make her lose weight and clean her up. Plus they out number her, so even if she said no they'd be able to over power her...

Unless she had at least one person join her! If just one of her friends joined her, it would be much more difficult for the other scouts to try and change her and whoever joins her back to normal. The maybe the two of them could eventually convince the others join them. If she invited one of them over for about a week, they'd probably be just like her by the end of the week.

Now the question was who should join her?

Perhaps Usagi? Usagi does like to eat sweets and isn't very active. She would probably be the most likely to adjust to Makoto's new lifestyle the quickest. Though Luna the cat might try to persuade Usagi against it... unless Makoto uses a recipe she saw. It was a recipe for cooking fish with lots of butter and gravy. "Well, it's just... a better way of living, I think" Makoto replied, "I realize that being a stick-thin doll just isn't working for me anymore, and I think some of this food would delight you!"

"No way, Makoto! There's not a chance in..."

Makoto put up a large, chocolate cake to Usagi's face. Usagi stared at the cake, as she licked her lips. Usagi could never resist a good chocolate cake.

"Awww, Usagi, not even for some cake?" Makoto teased.

".....Give me some," Usagi said as she took a piece. She took a taste and moaned at how good it tasted. Makoto smirked at Usagi and her meal. Little did Usagi know that the extra grease and eggs inside the cake would already do some effect to her. Luna was worried, but forgot about it as Makoto gave her a plate of milk.

"...Well, I guess we could have some dinner..." Usagi said.

135211.content:
Danny Phantom was chasing a ghost who was haunting some mattress factory. This ghost was an overweight woman who was wearing clothes that were obviously too tight on her, had very messy green hair, and looked like she never bathed.

"I was just sleeping!" the woman said. "Why are you... *huff*... chasing me?"

"Maybe because you were terrorizing everyone who worked there?" Danny quipped back. "How about that?"

"What, I can't... *huff* have some fun?" She said, getting very tired from her flight. "Boy, I need rest..."

She continued to fly away from Danny, but she was just getting more and more tired while he pressed on. She needed somewhere to hide while she got her strength back, but she couldn't find anywhere...

Then she saw someone, a young girl about the age of fourteen, dressed in black clothes. "Okay, I'll hide in her until I get my strength back. Now I just need a distraction..." the ghost said. She mustered up some energy to fire a ghost ray at a streetlight, darkening the entire street. Danny now couldn't see anything of what was happening as the ghost jumped into Sam's body...

Danny raised a glowing hand to see Sam. "Hey, where did that ghost go?" Danny asked.

"I don't know, I thought I just saw it..." Sam said.

"Well, whatever. She wasn't that big of a deal anyway." Danny said.

He and Sam then began to walk back home. Inside Sam, the ghost smiled to herself.

"Mmm, its nice in here. I think I'll stay a while." she said, going to sleep.

On the walk home...
135211.title: Sam gets posessed

1352111.content:
"-yawn- I don't know why, but I feel so tired all of a sudden. I'd better hurry home and get to bed." Sam said to herself as she approached her house. All she cared about right now was going to bed, even though it was hours before her regular bed time. The reason why she was so tired was because the ghost was sleeping inside her. This ghost wasn't a very powerful one so it didn't have complete control over Sam's mind, but it did influence Sam by what ever she did in her body. If the ghost was hungry, Sam would also be hungry, if the ghost was sleepy, Sam was sleepy. Anything the ghost did inside her head had effects on Sam, and Sam can't do anything about it. There were only a few things the ghost couldn't make Sam do, like force her to attack people she cared for or alter her memories. Though, that could change depending on how long the ghost stays in Sam's body...

As soon as Sam feel asleep, her dream began to fuse with the ghost's dream. In the dream Sam was in a place that looked like part of the ghost zone. What made this place different from most areas of the ghost zone was that it seemed more quiet and peaceful. That wasn't the only difference though, Sam looked around and noticed she was surrounded by tons of junk food. Then out of no where the ghost from the mattress factory appeared and began devouring the junk food in front of her.

"You! You're that ghost from that factory. Why did you bring me to the ghost zone?"

"I didn't. You're dreaming, we're not in the ghost zone."

"But I've never had a dream like this before."

"Eh, don't worry it's just a dream. Not all dreams have to make sense."

Sam did admit that this did seem a little too weird to be real. Why would she be in this place with a ghost that isn't attacking her, plus another strange thing she noticed was that she couldn't help but stare at the food. She would never crave any of this junk food normally, but it just looked so good, it had to be a dream.

The ghost couldn't help but notice Sam staring at the food. "Go ahead, eat it! I'm not gonna stop you." said the ghost as she handed Sam a bag of potato chips from her pile of snacks.

"Thank...um..."

"My name is Sally Slobby. Nice to meet you!"

"Hi, I'm Sam." am said in a friendly tone while she thought to herself "Sally Slobby? That sounds so cheesy, this has to be a dream."

After the brief introduction, Sam opened her bag of chips. It wasn't long before she grabbed huge handfuls to consume as many chips as possible. Soon the bag was empty and she reached for any other piece of unhealthy food within her grasp. She also didn't realize that because their dreams had merged, the pleasure the ghost felt from eating was also the pleasure Sam felt. The whole dream was nothing but the two of them eating anything but healthy food.

Though all good things must come to an end. Eventually Sam woke up from her dream, though she did sleep in until noon(it's summer vacation so she doesn't have to go to school for awhile). This morning would be different from normal though because Sam...

15512.content:
Today wasn't the best day for April. As Channel 6 News had been changing it's news format and letting employees go, April was one of the unfortunate ones let go of her position that she had for many years. She had joined the Turtles in their hideout as they had another pizza night.

"Aw, cheer up April!" Leonardo said, "You don't have to get dragged into our troubles too much now!"

"Yeah, yeah, I know," she replied as she slightly nibbled on a pizza, "But I'm gonna be stuck at home for a while, nobody's hiring news reporters right now..."

"Why the rush?" added Donatello, "You can relax at home in the meantime! Throw parties whenever you want......."

As April chewed on her pizza as Donatello rambled on, suddenly a thought came to her. Her eyes glazed wide open as a big smile came to her face. She got up and grabbed five pizza boxes.

"...go to the zoo, buy a dog...." Donatello continued as April took a box he was holding.

"Hope you don't mind me taking these back home!" she said as she ran out, "I'll pay you guys back!"

Three of the Turtles looked on in confusion to April's odd behavior, as Donatello still chattered on without seeing her leave.

---------------

April ran into her apartment excited, closing the door behind her and licking her lips. Finally, eating freedom.

She sat down, opened one box and took out a huge slice, shoving it into her mouth.

"Now I don't have to worry about what I eat..." she thought, "Finally, all that I can eat!"

Being the news reporter for so many years she had to watch her eating habits and how she ate. Now, she was free to do whatever she wanted. She already finished three slices at this point and was starting on a fourth. Cheese began to drip on her yellow suit, as she devoured more of the slices like a shark. Within a blink of an eye, she finished an entire pizza. Mouth full of cheese, and messy clothing, let her a little blushed.

"Well, I am a little messy," she thought, "But still more pizza!"

She opened a seocnd box and went straight in...

155122.content:
April woke up after having a good night's sleep. it was even better than usual. She no longer had to get up early to get ready for her job, now she could sleep in. It felt refreshing to sleep through the morning, but she was extra hungry that morning. Luckily she had a few slices of pizza left over from yesterday, which were good enough for breakfast. Of course she didn't realize that eating too much pizza can build up some serious gas.

PPFFFFRRRRTTTT!!!

"Whoa! was that me?" April had never farted that loud before, then again she never ate five boxes of pizza at once before.

Soon she forgot about her fart though as she suddenly realized she was hungry. Her stomach gave a loud growl, louder than usual. "Wow I must be more hungry than I thought. At least I don't have to worry about dieting anymore. But where am I going to go eat?"

April wasn't sure where to go for lunch. She had heard of a new restaurant in town that sounds interesting, but she wasn't sure what food they served. Then again she could go to the sewers with the turtles to grab some pizza, but they might not want to share with her since she took a lot of pizza from them yesterday. She had to chose somewhere to eat, so eventually she picked...
155122.title: The next day...

choices: She decides to spend all day in bed eating the pizza
At home, she accidently gets dirtier.
1551222.content:
April carefully snuck on down to the Turtles' secret hideaway. While in the sewers, she slipped and got some gross sewage on her suit, got a piece of gum stuck in her hair, and got some dirt on her face. For once though, she didn't seem to mind too much, and was even hungry enough to eat the old gum in her hair.

As she got to the hideout, she noticed that all the Turtles and Splinter were gone. They must've been off fighting somewhere, she thought. Spitting the gum out and putting it on her suit leg for later, she looked around for any leftover pizza boxes. After several minutes searching, it looked pretty empty around, except for some cans of soda that she entirely drank up while looking. Burping as she threw a can behind her, April sighed.

"No more pizza here..." she whined. Suddenly, she heard some footsteps. She hid behind a couch in case it was the Turtles and after the steps walked off, she got up and saw a stack of twenty pizza boxes!

"This must be their delivery" she thought. Drooling at the sight of the cheese and grease, she snatched up all the boxes. Reaching in her pocket, she took out a fifty dollar bill and placed it on a table.

"That'll cover that!" she smirked as she ran out of the sewers with the boxes, back to chewing on the old flavorless gum.

15532112222111.content:
Nora Valkyrie was bored. And if there was anything in the world that she hated, it was that. However, this was not the simple kind of boredom that training, going out somewhere or stuffing her faces with Ren's delicious pancakes would help. No, this was a far worse kind of boredom. Nora was bored of how, despite the lengths that she went to to get her childhood friend and crush, Lie Ren, to recognise that she had feelings for him, he never seemed to pick up on a single one of her hints.

Nora was tired of booping Ren on the nose and hoping he realised what that meant. She had been struck by inspiration. Nora had decided that, in order to get Ren to properly notice her, she would have to appeal to his tastes more. The only problem was that Nora had no idea what Ren's tastes actually were. Regardless, this was where she'd put her plan into action. Nora's first move would be to sweep Ren's section of the JNPR dorm room and see if there was anything there that would tip her off.

Nora reasoned that Ren probably wouldn't have something that would tip her off obviously lying around somewhere, and she couldn't find whatever she was looking for without searching around and causing any onlookers to immediately have questions about what she was doing, which she hardly wanted to disclose,. It would probably be for the best to wait until the dorm was empty. There was one problem, however.

The dorm was not currently empty. Nora, despite of her train of thought, couldn't stand the thought of waiting any longer to find out how to best please Ren. Luckily for her, Pyrrha had taken out Jaune to see a show, in a bid to finally get him to realise she liked him, and team RWBY was off on the town for the night, leaving her alone in the dorm with Ren. Nora gulped, trying to best think of a way to get Ren out of the dorm for long enough for her to find out what she was missing. Perhaps she could ask him to make her Pancakes? No, Ren had made so many pancakes for her that he'd got it down to an art, he'd be back in five minutes, tops. Nora needed a surefire way of keeping Ren out of the dorm long enough so that she could see if there were any clues for her. That's when it struck her. The perfect plan.

"Hey, Reeeeeeennnnnn?" Nora asked.

Looking up from a book he was reading, Ren responded "What is it?"

"Do you hear that?" Nora inquired, grinning.

Scratching his head in a confused manner, Ren responded "Hear what, Nora?"

Nora grinned as she bit her lip, lifted her leg up and grunted, before....

PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFF FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTT TTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT

....Ripping an absolutely deafening fart. Nora laughed, looking at Ren.

"That! Did you hear that?"

Ren chuckled slightly, before looking at Nora. Nora was shocked by Ren laughing about her flatulence, she'd expected him to be grossed out by it.

"How could I not hear tha-"

Ren was interrupted by a cough as TD covered his nose and mouth.

"Oh god! Nora, that stinks! I'll be outside if you need me!"

Ren left the room quickly, as Nora smiled. Her plan had worked perfectly. Now that she had evacuated Ren from the room with her flatulence, Nora shut the door and began searching the room. First she searched Ren and Jaune's shared closet, finding nothing. Nora realised that if Ren had anything to hide, it would not be in such an obvious spot. Nora decided to skip places like Ren's drawer and instead looked under his bed, finding a safe. Nora took the safe out from under the bed, shaking it and realising that there was definitely something inside. Nora tried several combinations, before eventually, the lock clicked after Nora entered her own birthday, surprising her.

"Huh? Why's Ren's safe combination my birthday? Eh, it's not that weird, we have been friends since forever, I guess. Anyway, Open Sesame!"

Nora pushed open the safe, looking inside to find a magazine with a woman in a swimsuit on the front. One thing, however, took Nora by surprise. The woman on the cover had a big round belly that she held in a seductive pose. Nora could tell that she wasn't pregnant and that that belly was pure fat. Nora smiled, cooing.

"Oh, soooo.... You're into big girls, huh, Rennie? So, all those times you gave me all the pancakes I could eat? Well, if it's what Ren likes, then I'll just have to pack my belly full of food until it's as round as a beach ball! Actually...."

Nora stopped and ran her fingers over her trim abdomen.

"Having a big, round belly does sound very nice.... So, Ren wants a girl with a big belly, and I want Ren and I wanna have a big belly, so the only question is what I'm waiting for... Heh, 'weight'-ing for.

Putting away Ren's magazine, Nora decided to...
15532112222111.title: Ren likes bigger ladies

info.brief_description: Your favorite anime and cartoon girls letting themselves go.
info.description:
Just like with http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1645132-Videogame-Slobs this is another attempt of mine to cash in on the Slob franchise here on Writing.com.

Also, just so there is no confusion here, Men can appear in this story, but not as the focus or to gain weight, if you want that sorta thing, find one of the many male-centered WG/Slob interactives.

Aside from that, if you just steer away from the things listed below, anything you want is allowed.
- Excessive scat(farting, belching, and such are fine and all, but when you turn the character into a constant crap machine, that is a bit much)
- Excessive swearing(Once again, turning a character into a swearing champ is a bit much, if the situation calls for it, then it's alright)
- Anything related to diapers(That shit just sucks)
- If you have a character that changes gender(such as Ranma), please try to keep them in the female form.
- Try to keep grammatical and spelling errors to a minimum.
- Unless it's adding onto the choices section(as in the series, character, and method selections), please try to write at least a paragraph for an entry.

Enjoy.
